projects.title: Coral Engine
projects.bodyText:
A custom game engine we wrote from scratch in C++, supporting PlayStation 5 and Windows.
 - **Type:** School project
 - **Team size:** 10 (6 programmers/4 designers/outsourced artists)
 - **Contribution:** PlayStation 5 support | Graphics (Clustered Shading, SSAO, VFX, Post-Processing and more!) | CI/CD Pipelines

projects.title: Clustered Shading
projects.bodyText:
A PBR renderer able to render tens of thousands of lights at playable frame-rates, created for the PlayStation 5.
 - **Type:** Free time project that evolved into school project
 - **Team size:** Solo
 - **Contribution:** PBR with Normal Mapping | Culling tens of thousands of lights | Blog Post | And everything else

projects.title: Blightspire
projects.bodyText:
A work-in-progress engine running on both Linux (Steam Deck) and Windows, using Vulkan.
 - **Type:** School project
 - **Team size:** 10 (9 programmers/1 designer)
 - **Contribution:** Rendering pipeline including a Frame Graph | Steamworks API integration | Input handling including input actions and Steam Input API | CI/CD Pipelines

projects.title: Ray-Tracing
projects.bodyText:
A work-in-progress Vulkan ray-tracer.
 - **Type:** Free time project
 - **Team size:** Solo
 - **Contribution:** Vulkan ray-tracing pipeline | GLTF model loading | And everything else

projects.title: Lichgate
projects.bodyText:
A relentless survivor, action rogue-like where you must grow stronger to vanquish the undead - made with our custom-built Coral Engine!
 - **Type:** School project
 - **Team size:** 10 (6 programmers/4 designers/outsourced artists)
 - **Contribution:** Movement and shooting mechanics | VFX

projects.title: Turbo Tails
projects.bodyText:
A 4 player mouse racing game with chaotic weapons.
 - **Type:** School project
 - **Team size:** 13 (3 programmers/4 designers/6 artists)
 - **Contribution:** Camera movement | Weapons | CI/CD Pipelines | UI

projects.title: CoPilot Designer
projects.bodyText:
During my internship and summer work at Talespin, I have contributed to CoPilot Designer, which is a no-code authoring tool for immersive soft skills learning content.
 - **Type:** Internship project that evolved into work project
 - **Team size:** -
 - **Contribution:** Working with QA to fix unintended behaviour | Maintaining web platform | User data updater for each applications new version | Image exporter for visual graphs | QoL features for artists

projects.title: Fiber Based Job System
projects.bodyText:
A research project about multi-threading in game engines and working with fibers to create a job system.
 - **Type:** Free time project that evolved into school project
 - **Team size:** Solo
 - **Contribution:** Job System using Fibers | Blog Post | And everything else

projects.title: Worship
projects.bodyText:
A co-op puzzle platformer where you have to work together to avoid obstacles and find a way to bring the green crystal to the altar! Made during my internship at XR Lab.
 - **Type:** Internship project
 - **Team size:** 11 (5 programmers/6 artists)
 - **Contribution:** Camera movement | Obstacles
